about_the_game:
Skyseeker is a monster-collecting metroidvania where every enemy is catchable. Enter a world where ancient creatures thrive in a world lost to time. As a Skyseeker, join the legendary explorers who tame these monsters and attempt to reach the fabled summit of the sky.


Skyseeker is currently in Open Beta, which means we're periodically releasing free builds for playtesting. The current release has about ~half the planned content for the game, featuring the first four areas and a wide variety of creatures. Our main goal is to collect feedback, so please give us your thoughts after playing through Skyseeker.
